item.title: New website
item.description: As time is approaching to start writing about my Master’s thesis I decided to resume writing on my blog. You should find here posts about my research in the area of Type theory, Idris and Finance. Big kudos to creators of Hugo and terminal-theme

item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal website and blog. My current interests are: Distributed systems and Type theory. My day to day language is C#, recently developed interest in Haskell and Idris. Converted to Linux, huge fan of i3
